meta.Title: SHORT SUBJECTS [New York Times, Sunday, November 20, 1949]
meta.Author: Harold T. Bers

across.question: Former Louisiana Senator, succeeded by Russell Long.
Author of "A Visit From St. Nicholas."
He played the Tin Man in "Wizard of Oz."
Creator of Fort Penn and Grace Caldwell.

down.question: Noted English Cardinal, leader of Oxford Movement (1801–1890).
Founder of the order of Jesuits, 1534.
President of U. N. General Assembly.
